message.content:
cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.SI, cs.DC, cs.CY 

The paper discusses a solution for mitigating DDoS attacks by controlling traffic at the endpoint and in the network. This involves network capabilities and redirecting traffic to a third-party service provider. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also discusses security and cryptography (cs.CR), system and control (cs.SI), distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC), and cybersecurity (cs.CY).
